definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: The valve trap effectively prevents sewage and fecal backflow into the house, ensuring the smooth flow of the drainage system.
sentences.chinese: 有效防止污水及糞便倒流入室內，而可保持排水暢順。

sentences.english: Advanced technology and improve its services, to ensure that your production flow.
sentences.chinese: 先進技術和完善的服務，以確保您的生產暢順。

sentences.english: Over the last 12 years, the Court of Final Appeal has been functioning smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 終審法院在過去12年一直運作暢順。
